page.title: 05EDUCATION (1.)
page.content: There are no Schools in the area so children have to travel to the following either by walking, cycling, private transport or transport provided by the Local Education Authority. {Pre-School. }There are Play Groups at Bockleton, St. Michaels and Tenbury. Nursery School at Tenbury. {Primary Schools }at Kimbolton and Tenbury Wells. {Comprehensive Schools. }Tenbury High School and the Minster School, Leominster. {Sixth Form Colleges }at Hereford, Kidderminster, Leominster, Ludlow and Worcester. {Private.}St. Michaels College see p 6. {Evening Classes}are held in Parish Hall for Play Group Association Courses, First Aid, Floral Art,Yoga, Handicrafts and Womens Institute.
